website_summaries.verdict: This Mr. Potato Head toy is truly versatile, and offers kids the opportunity to create fun faces on 4 different characters.
pros: Kids can create an entire Mr
Potato Head family with this kit that includes 2 standard and 2 small potato heads and accessories to make Mr. and Mrs. plus their pets
cons: Priciest choice on our list, but you get a lot of pieces for your money
Reports of pieces that either won't fit or fall out of the potato holes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for kids who like Mr. Potato Head!!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid likes to play with Mr. Potato Head, this set is a great. I bought this for my 2 in half yr. old son, who is now into Mr. Potato Head. I was looking for a set that came with lots of pieces. This set comes with the big Potato Head, the eyes, mouth, ears, and nose do come out, and it is also a storage for all the pieces. It also came with 2 regular size Mr. Potato's and 2 small ones. It has lots of pieces including pieces to make a dog and cat potato. This is great. My son plays with it for hours through the day.
customer_reviews.author: terah

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this toy. A couple of things to note-I never seem to be able to get all the pieces back in and the lid to close. Why couldn’t the manufacturer leave an extra inch of room? Also, some of the pieces have a hard time snapping in, if they even do (yellow hair for female spud does not). However, I do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyMom

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a good product, however ..... the one I received was missing several pieces. I tried to get them replaced but would have to return entire item.... which sounds easy enough until you try to box up a toy that your child JUST opened and loves. ( minus the fact that the large potato head has no nose or mouth 😶
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Pieces are hard for my 3 year old to push into potato
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mr.potato head but the pieces are hard to stick in the holes so he needs help playing with it. The hats also don’t fit on the potato head, the post doesn’t quite reach the hole in the head and the hats are misshapen so they just pop off the head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2 1/2 year old loves them and they are many combos he can play around with so if hes happy I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: First off this thing is HUGE 😂 i had no clue what I was getting myself into, so many pieces so many potatoes! My 2 1/2 year old loves them and they are many combos he can play around with so if hes happy I'm happy. Only reason I took off a star is because some of the pieces are hard to put in their places and thats frustrating for a 2 yr old & another issue is sometimes the all the pieces dont fit into the big potato and again its frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter (and adults) had a lot of fun with it regardless
customer_reviews.text: This Potsto Head collection couldn’t be cuter!!! The head itself is storage for all the pieces, and the face parts also fit on it! The box was torn when it arrived, and had two Kohl’s stickers on it, which I found odd. I’m not sure if it was a return, but the pieces were all there. Granddaughter (and adults) had a lot of fun with it regardless!
customer_reviews.author: MamaRita

customer_reviews.title: Great value, loads of fun for 2.5 yo
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4/5 because the annoyance of the back of the potatoe heads keeps coming out/pushed in if you hold it over the compartment. My son is 2.5 and it bothers him when they pop in/off. Otherwise, for the cost and the amount of pieces you get, this is a great value! Mom loves the fact that all the pieces fit in the large plastic potatoe head and even he has eyes, ears and mouth that can work on it or the smaller potato head.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kais

customer_reviews.title: Too tightly fitting
customer_reviews.text: The many different pieces don't fit very easily on mrs. Potato or mr. Potato. It can be quite difficult to get the pieces in so the only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because I think the pieces are quite difficult for a child to manage under the age of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Camden

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Excitement and pure enjoyment the moment the package was opened! This was bought for my grandchildren as I wanted to be able to gift them something that can gap our ages. The memories and laughs I had when playing with Mr. Potato Head as a child did not compare to the joy, happiness and smiles this gift gave my grand babies. The package along with another Mr. Potato Head set was delivered in a timely manner and I would recommend this product for anyone looking for a fun, imaginative toy for young aged children.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Jara

customer_reviews.title: Old school fun
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our niece, she has enjoyed it since we gave it to her. I knocked off a star because the one we got looks like it was returned and not packaged well. Everything was there though, wouldn't have been much of an issue except it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My nephew looooves this. All pieces were there and in good condition. Some pieces are real tough to pop in and pull out but he's not bothered by it. He'll just ask me. Very cute, worth the price, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage "potato". Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one playset with tons of options and hours of fun. I love the storage "potato".
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Mr Potato head
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my daughter. She loves Mr. potato head and when I saw this I knew I had to get one and I know she’s going to love it! It came just in time for Christmas. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great potato set!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son absolutely loves this set. He mixes and matches, making some goofy looking potatoes! The price is kind of high in my opinion but at least he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bush

customer_reviews.title: Some things are timeless!
customer_reviews.text: Potato Head people are great! This set is perfect since all the parts fit inside the cute container. It fits well in our "Kid's Room" for the grandkids and I anticipate it will stay there for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great starter for potato head collection
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my oldest son for Christmas and it started his obssession with potato heads! There are so many different parts he really uses his imagination and creates some silly potato heads. Kids have come over and always wanting to play with it so I ended up gifting them one on their birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vorse

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage
customer_reviews.text: Although some pieces seem tight to fit in, my toddler loves this toy. I do wish there were more variety of pieces, but I like that everything fits in the larger potato head, so clean up is easy and fun for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: sunnysidesteph

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: My kids like it, nice set, may buy extra accessories though, it only comes with enough to build the four potatoes no extras.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy222

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE it! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and I love how it can be easily picked up and put away with the container. My 2&3 year old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Potato Head and Additional
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Item was shipped faster than expected. It comes with everything you see in the image. Enough pieces to make Mr. & Mrs. Potato head and pets (dog and a cat). My daughter loves it. And the container which is the huge potato is kinda see through and it has removable eyes, nose and mouth which you can add to the potatoes that come inside for extra fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bigred87xo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this with so many spuds to create. It's so fun watching them play.
customer_reviews.author: jelly

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids to even share with
customer_reviews.text: This was the only toy my son asked for Christmas and he was SO excited to get it. They all had a blast with so many different choices and options with the variety of characters included in the tub. Great toy for kids to even share with. Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaa4444

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made....Pieces keep falling off.
customer_reviews.text: The back piece of the potato head that works as the door for storage keeps falling off and won't stay in place. The wigs are too small for the for heads so they are of no use.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun set!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas present for our Great Granddaughter, and I couldn't be more pleased. Mr. Potato Head has come a long way since my kids were small ! All the pieces allow for creativity and imagination, and are sturdy enough that we don't have to worry about breakage. The colors are bright and vivid, which children in that 3-5 year age bracket so enjoy. I am very very happy that we purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Werts

customer_reviews.title: Love that even the storage container has changeable face pieces.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? A whole collection of variously sized potato heads and tons of accessories. I was inspired to purchase this after my toddler fell in love with Toy Story the movie, and he has been enamored with this kit ever since. It has inspired tons of imaginary play for the both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter loves this and spends lots of time playing with it. She creates all sorts of funny Potato Heads! Lots of smaller pieces that can get easily lost, so it is great to have the big Potato Head jar to keep them all in.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good choice for helping a toddler learn to say new words. Our 3 year old fell in love with this almost immediately and has even picked up a few new words like "Eyes" , "Hat" , etc. What is really neat is that it comes with a giant Potato Head storage Unit where you can organize the other individual components. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tejas K. Baxi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy. I like that there are several different ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. I like that there are several different sizes of potato heads and accessories. The only thing I don't like about this product is that my kids can't put it all back in the big potato head by themselves. It is a puzzle to make it all fit so that the hat goes back on and its all together.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Package
customer_reviews.text: i actually buy this to entertain my boys in a long flight. i did not use them yet but im sure they will enjoy it. it comes in a big "Mr Potato" hard plastic container which also has eyes,ears,nose to play with the parts fits well. each spud has a "lid" on the back where u can store the accessories. i looooooove it,Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: SCREAMIN DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my twin 3yo nieces for their birthday. they love it! there are soooo many pieces. this was a steal! i highly recommend it. everyone needs a MR potato head!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but some pieces are missing. Ear nose .
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Cute classic toy!
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids from ages 2 to 8 have had a lot of fun with this. Will be a keeper for a lot of years! Love that the large potato head is a storage container for the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest set and keeps my 3 year old grandson busy for ages. Love the container! Lots of combinations
customer_reviews.author: corvettejr

customer_reviews.title: This exceeded my expectations. The potato head toy holder ...
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. The potato head toy holder pieces are also removable. So you basically get 5 dolls. My son loves them and was excited by the tiny pets and enjoys making them into babies.
customer_reviews.author: Pache

customer_reviews.title: Lots of variations
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has spent hours try out the variations of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L. Sandusky

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is unneccessary
customer_reviews.text: I love how many pieces you get. However the packaging is unnecessary as I now just keep them in plastic bins. The back compartment of Mr. Potato Head falls off or gets pushed in very easily which frustrates my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Grandson love them
customer_reviews.text: Grandson love these. He's totally into potato heads right now and these added to his collection. :) The big potato head's facial parts come off just like the small ones. It's a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: TAW229Top Contributor: Soap Making

customer_reviews.title: Awesome aet with lots of options and endless possibilites
customer_reviews.text: Awesome aet with lots of options and endless possibilites. It doesnt make obnoxious noises so its one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: trisha willett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the bigger mr. potato head container to store all the smaller parts!!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cool potato head toy
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love it! The only problem is getting all the pieces back inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit in my home. I have two littles who love to play potato heads. Love that we now have storage for all the little pieces too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Alot of Toy & Value -
customer_reviews.text: A great assortment of toys for the price and a container for all the pieces - great purchase and perfect for birthday gifts!
customer_reviews.author: wyguy

customer_reviews.title: My son loved Mr. Potato Head Super Spud and the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved Mr. Potato Head Super Spud and the pieces were easy to keep up with....although he was able to lose a few of them and I loved it so I knew he would enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo f

customer_reviews.title: It's good for supervised play because little ones don't have the ...
customer_reviews.text: The parts are a bit hard to fit. It's good for supervised play because little ones don't have the strength to push the parts all the way in. It's a good buy and my boy has fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: P.G. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son that has autism and is in the process of learning body parts!!! Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mr potato head we have gotten! So many cute accessories and I love the storage container!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Chose this multi piece Super Sud kit. Nice variety of items to use on the potato heads. Each potato head also has storage space inside for pieces. The Super Spud can store all of the pieces. My Granddaughter has played with this kit on a daily basis since Christmas. Shipping was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Barb B.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for our 2 year old and our 4 and 6 year old can't put it down
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the different options this has to offer. My 2 year old (2 as of today) loves dumping everything out and putting it back into the BIG potato, my other two kido's like to change the way they the normal size and little potato look. So far it's killed at least 2 hours of imagination at its best :-)
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: It is what my nephew wanted and it a great amount for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is huge! OMG! It is what my nephew wanted and it a great amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather V

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, great bargain!!
customer_reviews.text: You actually get 5 potato heads in 1: mama, papa, 2 pets, and a giant one that doubles as the storage container.
customer_reviews.author: David Perlman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy !
customer_reviews.text: My son loves mr. Potato head and this was perfect for him, it includes many pieces and definitely keeps my 3 year old very entertained. I love the container itself, helps keep all pieces in one place. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stephxx

customer_reviews.title: I wanted one for myself, too!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this because it was so big! I gave it to my Great Grandsons and I don't get to see them often but I can only imagine that they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Leader

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. 3y old boys and 6y old girl. Plenty of pieces and potato heads for all to play at same time.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I bit disappointing to open and find that it was missing an ear, and the girl hair doesn’t seem to fit either. My 3yo is still enjoying the toy, but for the price it would be nice to have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves playing with the small cat and dog potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes you smile
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old Granddaughter loved it, and all the kids who watched her open her gift...kids were all over it ha ha!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It keeps her busy which is great!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her set of potato heads!!! Even at two, she can put things together in her own unique way!! It keeps her busy which is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money and chair than Kohl's. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Trap door falls off
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set. The animals are a good addition. The bottom trap door does not stay in as well as the older sets.
customer_reviews.author: NomadMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price I got this for with a Daily Deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We love Mr. Potato Head at our house and I'd been looking for a big accessories set. This is it. Lots of pieces to use and the dog/cat potatoes are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: AnselsMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages..
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this there are all kinds of cool ways to dress up Mr. Potato head. They are always playing with it. Not a bad price either...glad we picked it up.
customer_reviews.author: importceo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!! So many options In One big tub! By far the best value for money and you can even make a cat and dog potato ! My 2 and 4 year old love playing with this. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy's mum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for kids with speech delays or any child ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy for kids with speech delays or any child learning body parts! I've used this toy both at work with kids and at home with my own 2 year old who has speech delays and the body parts are clearly recognizable and not so small that they ould be swallowed! Hours of fun with this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not all the pieces actually fit properly making this work only half of the time. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Peacoat

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the one I had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are really difficult to get into the potato head and are more of a hard plastic than a firm rubber that my set was like when I was a kid. Save your money and hope the grandparents saved your potato head.
customer_reviews.author: JD M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great learning toy and not to mention a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great learning toy and not to mention a great value. My kids are really enjoying the Playsckool Mr. Potato Head and learning all of the body part with it. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $37
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 1/2 year old for Christmas. Im not impressed at all. Hard for him to get the parts into the holes securely. Wasnt much as far as "body parts". Worth maybe $20.
customer_reviews.author: beanhead

customer_reviews.title: My boys absolutely love playing with this Mr
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love playing with this Mr. Potato Head set. It gives everyone a chance to play at the same time and swap the accessories and body parts. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Taina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. the shipping box was badly damaged and couldn't wrap it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Patty

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun..
customer_reviews.text: Love how many combinations you can make. Our son spends hours playing.. The carring case is perfect too!!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, big and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product was missing pieces otherwise it’s very cute.

customer_reviews.title: It was missing the large eyes. Will be returning ...
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the large eyes. Will be returning this item and getting a new one. If all of the pieces are with the new one, I will then change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Parts don't fit smoothly into the holes. Even for adult it is hard to place them. Otherwise it's a fun toy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cool the kids (the other kids not me) lived it

customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this. There's so many different things they can make. The giant potato for the case is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever!

customer_reviews.text: How could this be anything but great. It's Mr. Potato Head!!!

customer_reviews.text: It wasn't exactly like the picture but it has severed it's purpose. Some of parts are missing but with a 3 year old we have lost some too.

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato Head Super Spud
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved Mr. Potato Head Super Spud and the pieces were easy to keep up with....although he was able to lose a few of them. I had a Mr. Potato Head when I was a child (60 some years ago) and I loved it so I knew he would enjoy it too, even when he played by himself.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Christmas buy
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Potato Head and the gang are a HUGE hit with my kids. Everything is interchangeable and they come in their own storage container, who has his own parts. Fantastic Christmas buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Love it. I like how it all stores in one place.

product_meta.title: Playskool Mr. Potato Head Super Spud
product_meta.description: Includes: Large: Mr. Potato Head container, baseball cap, one pair of eyes, nose, tow ears, and mouth. Regular size: Two potato bodies, four arms, two noses, two tongues, pair of lips, two ears with earrings, two ears, three pairs of eyes, hairdo, two pairs of pants with legs, four hats, pair of glasses, three mustaches, and mouth. Small: Two potato bodies, cat face, cat ears, cat feet, fog face, dog ears, and dog feet.
feature_bullets: Including both Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head bodies, two pet potatoes and over 45 accessory pieces, this Playskool Super Spud set offers endless mix-and-match options.
Product Features: Mr. Potato Head container stores pieces.

Includes: Mr. Potato Head container, 2 regular potato bodies, 2 small potato bodies, baseball cap, 4 hats, hairdo, purse, glasses, 4 pair of eyes, 4 ears, 2 ears with earrings, 2 noses, 2 mouths, 2 tongues, lips, 3 mustaches, 4 arms, 2 pairs of pants with legs, cat face, cat ears, cat feet, dog face, dog ears & dog feet.
